title: 8-04s16.jpg
description: A Mach-Zehnder interferometer, with two beam splitters, two mirrors, and two detectors, is used to test if an  Elitzur-Vaidman bomb is functional without detonating it. Image by MIT OpenCourseWare.

image_metadata.caption: A Mach-Zehnder interferometer, with two beam splitters, two mirrors, and two detectors, is used to test if an Elitzur-Vaidman bomb is functional without detonating it. (Image by MIT OpenCourseWare.)
image_metadata.image-alt: Lines and boxes showing experimental set-up of a Mach-Zehnder interferometer.
